```{python connect to database}
import psycopg2
import pandas

connected = True

try:
    conn = psycopg2.connect(
      dbname = r.dbName,
      user = r.username,
      host = r.host,
      password = r.password
    )
except:
    print("Unable to connect to database")
    connected = False
if(connected):
    cur = conn.cursor()
```
